item.title: Automagical HTTPS with Docker and Go
item.description: I’ve been building a lot of webhooks lately, and more often than not, I need serve my applications over HTTPS. A common way of quickly achieving this is by utilising Let’s Encrypt, however it can be a bit fiddly to setup. I’d really like to be able to automate the process entirely, including certificate renewal. I’ve been building my applications using docker, and I’d like to keep the build process and container images as lightweight as possible.
